description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin & Goat's Cheese Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pumpkin & Goat's Cheese Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 625g pumpkin, peeled, deseeded and cut into slightly larger dice

recipeInstructions.text: Put the beetroot, pumpkin and onion into a roasting tin, drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with the fennel seeds and salt and pepper. Roast the vegetables in a preheated oven, 200°C for 20-25 minutes, turning once, until well browned and tender.
Cut the goat's cheeses in half and nestle each half among the roasted vegetables. Sprinkle the cheeses with a little salt and pepper and drizzle with some of the pan juices.
Return the dish to the oven for about 5 minutes, until the cheese is just beginning to melt. Sprinkle with rosemary and serve immediately.
